Aftew exhausting my suppwies in taking it down, I sawvaged what meat I couwd. Vewy chewy, but not unpweasant. Wooking acwoss the beach, I spot many simiwaw mounds of sand. I must keep moving; daywight is coming.
monster.jellyfish.name: Jewwyfish
monster.jellyfish.story:
An aiwbowne cweatuwe, capabwe of fwight using a combination of gases in its cweaw huww. Wike the Jewwyfish on eawth, they awso use puwsation to aid in wocomotion; howevew, wathew than a sewies of tentacwes, they have two 'bwanches' made of many tentacwes wwapped awound themsewves.

Awso wike the Jewwyfish, they have quite the sting, capabwe of penetwating my weathew shiewding. The same gases used fow fwight awe used to cweate a vewy powewfuw ewectwostatic chawge.

When they awe not busy hunting me, the Jewwyfish have been seen sunbathing and absowbing the stwange fumes fwom the gwound.
monster.child.name: Chiwd
monster.child.story:
These smaww beings fiww me with dwead.. Fwom a distance I can see them fwowicking among the wocks- pwaying with the othew ghostwy 'chiwdwen'. I don't know how ewse to descwibe them, they seem so innocent untiw I appwoach. 

Once I am spotted it as if some wicked switch is fwipped and I am theiw pwaything. Whiwe I can defeat the smaww gwoups, I feaw I am onwy seawing my doom once theiw smaww, destwoyed bodies awe found.
monster.spitter.name: Spittew
monster.spitter.story:
Awas, anothew hostiwe cweatuwe. This one's natuwe cewtainwy betways its pwecocious appeawance. It even seems to be vexed by my wetawiation. What a petuwant fewwow. 

His snapping maw huwws owange biwe. The acidic mucus must be detonated by the gnashing teeth- conceivabwy simiwaw to ouw picwic acid. Fascinating, how couwd this have awisen? 

Post-mowtem I was awso abwe to discovew the souwce of the cweatuwe's impwessive fwexibiwity. Aside fwom the skuww, mandibwe, and teeth, the skeweton is highwy cawtiwaginous!
monster.tinyImp.name: Tiny Imp
monster.tinyImp.story:
I seem to have found the one cweatuwe on this pwanet that DOESN'T want to kiww me. These smaww, weathewy cweatuwes awe spawned fwom vases I sometimes spot in the wuins. They seem to stay in packs, and fwequentwy cawwy usefuw tweasuwe.

Immediatewy aftew spawning, these tiny imps wun in aww diwections. Whiwe I do feew a bit.. awfuw.. about kiwwing what seems to be the equivawent of chiwdwen, I need the tweasuwe they howd if I'm to suwvive. I'm sowwy.
monster.blackImp.name: Bwack Imp
monster.blackImp.story:
Oh. Feaw. The Imp causes me feaw, with its wazow shawp tawons and its one eye, wocked into mine thwough my hewmet. The Imp uses a pwopewwant to hovew above the gwound, giving it supewiow mobiwity ovew evewything.. incwuding me. 

Unwike the othew fauna on this pwanet, the bwack imp is aggwessive to aww othew species. Is the imp awso stwanded hewe?

The Bwack Imp can move fwom wocation to wocation, seemingwy instantwy. I wefuse to bewieve that the Imp has tewepowtation; that is fow faiwy tawes and quantum physicists. I won't accept that it can achieve something biowogicawwy that the human wace couwdn't achieve in its entiwe histowy.
monster.mushrum.name: Mushwum
monster.mushrum.story:
I have awwived in an even stwangew wand. Aftew wecovewing fwom my sudden.. tewepowtation, I noticed that my suit was fwashing wawnings about aiw fiwtwation. Aww acwoss the wandscape wewe giant fungi, some as taww as twees.

When appwoaching a wawge buwbous mushwoom, it suddenwy spwouted out the gwound, jumping a few feet in the aiw then wanding on two nubby feet. At this point my aiw fiwtwation wawning went fwom yewwow to wed, and I began to have difficuwties bweathing..

Whiwe sentient, these mushwums wewe not vewy intewwigent. It had what wooked wike thwee eyes, but it couwd not navigate vewy weww, impwying that those may be fake eyes to scawe pwedatows. It awso had no mouth to eat, but wouwd pwant itsewf ovew cowpses, swowwy absowbing nutwients thwough its woot-wike feet.
monster.whorl.name: Whoww
monster.whorl.story:
Day 8. I was awoken by an abwupt cowwision of something hawd against my suit. A vowwey of sensows scweamed in my eaws as a haiwwine fwactuwe awced acwoss my vision. 

The hawd sheww of a monstwous “Whoww” neawwy compwomised my aiw wock. If I hadn't had a smaww tube of powymew seawant fwom the astwotwain I wouwd not be wecowding this now. 

These cawapaced owganisms pwopew themsewves with some fowm of gas-pwopuwsion. Despite theiw simiwaw appeawance to the nautiwi of owd, they do not use a bewwows-wike system fow wocomotion, but a steady stweaming of gas thwough theiw cuwwing sheww. I wondew if this heavy awmow pwevents them fwom attaining highew awtitudes, constwained to hovew among the wand cweatuwes.
monster.clayMan.name: Cway Man
monster.clayMan.story:
Quick with his swowd and quickew with his feet; the agiwity of these cway 'peopwe' is unexpected with a fowm so woughwy shaped. 

When faced with one of the few cweatuwes hewe which I feew some humanity in, my awoneness cwoses in. Why do they have cway pots on theiw heads? Couwd it be pwotection fwom this cwuew weawity, ow maybe just to hide the scaws fwom this bwutaw pwanet..
monster.bighornBison.name: Bighown Bison
monster.bighornBison.story:
The tewepowtew neawwy waunched me into a steaming dung heap. I couwd not have anticipated such an enowmous beast being its souwce. Mowe impwessive than theiw wumbwing bewwows is the bighown's chawge. Theiw many tons of muscwe pwoduce a cwushing swam of hown and matted haiw. 

When they awe not stampeding aftew me I have obsewved these monstews using theiw massive heads to bwudgeon wocks and fight amongst themsewves. How can they expend so much enewgy on fwuitwess activity? Awe they mewewy twying to keep fwom fweezing?
monster.mechanicalSpider.name: Mechanicaw Spidew
monster.mechanicalSpider.story:
The mawwawe of ouw age! These mechanicaw pawasites wewe pwobabwy wuwking on the ship befowe the cwash. Piwates wiww use these bugs to cowwect especiawwy vawuabwe cawgo, wediwect twansmission signaws, ow even hijack ships. Spidews can be pwogwammed with aww kinds of mawicious objectives. 

In genewaw they awe quite difficuwt to find and ewadicate on wawge vessews, but now that they'we woose they seem to be abwe to opewate outside theiw softwawe. They have wetained theiw defense capabiwities, and awe wisky to engage. Though, I wondew, how wong wiww they continue to wun without access to an ewectwicaw gwid?
monster.gup.name: Gup
monster.gup.story:
It is quite wawe that I smeww anything thwough my wespiwatow. I couwd not have been pwepawed fow how bizawwe no wongew having a sense of smeww is.  Howevew, thewe have been a wawe few occasions when I caught some twace awoma- genewawwy somewhat bittew on this pwanet, but I savow them gweediwy. 

When I encountewed this gewatinous beast I was assaiwed by a sweet smeww! A stwangewy fwuity scent.. Oh, how it bwings me back to a mowe innocent time! As I stwuck the congeawed bwimp of a cweatuwe it divided and seemed to gain enewgy. With each bwow mowe of the sacchawine odow escaped the monstew. I must admit, I may have been ovewzeawous in my attack..
monster.parent.name: Pawent
monster.parent.story:
A deadwy fowce, they wush at me mad with gwief and wage. Pawents wiww swam the gwound; theiw onwy aim to cwush the butchew of theiw offspwing. Theiw powewfuw bwows open gweat washes in the quaking gwound.

Though my guiwt awmost stays my hand, I cannot wet them keep me fwom suwviving this nightmawish pwanet. I know it is impossibwe to queww theiw fuwy; so instead I must end it.
monster.evolvedLemurian.name: Evowved Wemuwian
monster.evolvedLemurian.story:
Couwd this be a distant cousin of the Wemuwians bewow? An ancient evowutionawy weap? These aiwbowne weptiwes do not intewact with the gwound Wemuwians except to hawass them occasionawwy. Pewhaps thewe is some kind of natuwaw feud between the species? 

It is the membwanous skin that attaches theiw wong awms to theiw body which enabwes theiw fwight. Each wingtip cuwminates in vicious tawons. When they come in fwocks these winged Wemuwians awe capabwe of gweat cawnage.
monster.templeGuard.name: Tempwe Guawd
monster.templeGuard.story:
A wobot cweatuwe that assembwes itsewf.. I have not seen them matewiawize othew than when I unknowingwy twiggew theiw pwesence. I cannot bewieve this is indeed a machine- and yet it is made fwom some awwoy and uses heavy awtiwwewy! Was this on the ship, ow awe these guawds a natuwawwy occuwwing 'species' hewe? My suit's scannews awe unabwe to detect any manufactuwews' signatuwe.

They seem to be detewmined not to wet me pass. They attack with unwimited focus.
monster.elderLemurian.name: Ewdew Wemuwian
monster.elderLemurian.story:
Seems to be vewy wawge vewsion of the Wemuwians; pewhaps this gweat wizawd is a queen? With simiwaw awmow and much thickew skin, it took much mowe to bwing down this foe. She moves much swowew and posses a powewfuw scowching bwast.

I wouwd wiwwingwy give up some of my dwindwing wations to expwowe the Wemuwian tunnews unnoticed. My mind envisions gweat communaw cavewns and many spectacuwaw subtewwanean dwewwings. Do gweat wegions of Wemuwians wawk undew my feet?
monster.archerBug.name: Awchew Bug
monster.archerBug.story:
Such aggwavating cweatuwes! These insects come in dwoves- as a gwoup theiw wings cweate a maddening whine. Even the othew cweatuwes seem distuwbed by theiw pwesence. Though they awe not pawticuwawwy stwong, the ciwcwing insects cewtainwy fwustwate me. 

A smaww amount of theiw pwojectiwe spit managed to penetwate one of the wayews of my suit. It was extwemewy caustic. A festewing wash has fowmed in the awea, but doesn't seem to be spweading.
monster.colossus.name: Cowossus
monster.colossus.story:
A wow gwoaning, wasting fow a few days at weast. Fwom the wewative safety of my dwop pod I watched as a mountain wose to its knees, pushing itsewf up with awms of stone and diwt and twine. 

The Cowossus appeaws as a cousin of the Wock Gowem and shawe many simiwawities, fwom its wed gaze to its stocky statuwe. Awound its feet many smawwew gowems wose, joining it. In what possibwe ways couwd conventionaw weapons hewp me?

I've begun to find a dawk humow in the absowute ovewkiww that I face. This is simpwy widicuwous.
monster.wanderingVagrant.name: Wandewing Vagwant
monster.wanderingVagrant.story:
Day 3. Whiwe wooking thwough some wweckage of the owd ship, I fewt a hot sensation on my skin and a bwiwwiant white fwash. Ovew the howizon maybe 5 miwes nowth I saw it, wooming ovew the fowest tops.

It must be the size of a house, this thing. A massive vawiant of the jewwyfish seen eawwiew; this behemoth hovews in the aiw, seawching fow something. The gas used to pwopew this beast bend the twees bewow it fwat. When it spotted its pwey, it sent out six biowuminescent owbs, aww cwashing towawds the gwound and incinewating the tawget. 

This Vagwant, as I've come to caww it, seems to wandew amidst the skies, fowwowed by many jewwyfish. On the occasion the cwouds pawt, I sweaw I sometimes see hundweds of vagwants up thewe. What awe they wooking fow?
monster.magmaWorm.name: Magma Wowm
monster.magmaWorm.story:
I've stumbwed upon an owd wewic, notabwy with two distinct stone pwongs. On appwoaching it it whiwwed to wife, appawentwy chawging up. This seemed to distuwb something deep and viowent bewow the gwound..

The Magma Wowm expwoded out of the gwound, knocking me off my feet. Whiwe I stwuggwed with sheww shock, I saw it awc thwough the sky, then pwunge back into the gwound with anothew bang. 

Weaching about.. 200 metews, the wowm moves extwemewy fast fow its size. Pewmanentwy buwning out of powes in its skin, the Magma Wowm uses this fwame as both a hunting toow and a way to mewt thwough the gwound quickwy. Its smaww, beady eyes wuwch awound, wooking fow pwey. With its massive size, the Magma Wowm must eithew eat VAST amounts of food a day ow hibewnate fow a vewy, vewy, vewy wong time bewow gwound.
monster.ancientWisp.name: Ancient Wisp
monster.ancientWisp.story:
Couwd this be the awchitect of the smawwew wisps? Pewhaps this Ancient Wisp is the puppeteew behind the fiewy masks hawassing me thus faw, ow is he awso a deviwish device of something gweatew..?

The heat coming off the puwpwe fwames is extweme. Fewocious cowumns of wightning thweaten to showt-out my suit, ow wowse, tuwn me into a bwistewed husk. What fuews these viowent, buwning appawitions?
monster.impOverlord.name: Imp Ovewwowd
monster.impOverlord.story:
Oh, why me? My heawt stopped when this gweat Imp manifested in pweviouswy empty space. So many howwendous eyes. With a gaping scweam the Imp wets out a deadwy wed vapow. Some type of wasew awso twaiws me. 

This demon is just as baffwing in its movements as the smawwew one. Bawewy escaping the Imp's whipping gwasp I wanded a finaw bwow. Its dying body spwit open at its mewidian, dispwaying its innawds wike some ghastwy fwowew. This monstew is just as gwuesome in death as it was in wife.
monster.ifrit.name: Ifwit
monster.ifrit.story:
Couwd this be..? Tawes I nevew bewieved wecounted a howwibwe beast, fiwe incawnate. Scouwge of anothew sowaw system, the Ifwit neawwy wiped out an entiwe space cowony befowe being chained and waunched into the gweat bwack void. Supposedwy the fwaming jets that accompanied his woaws couwd be seen fow days as he dwifted outwawds. 

Gweat towews, what must have been the containment stwuctuwe used to twap this monstew, pwevent his escape even on this fowsaken pwane. The onwy expwanation I have fow my suwviving this wegendawy encountew is his many yeaws dwifting in space and having been fettewed in this unfowgiving, fwozen wastewand.
monster.toxicBeast.name: Toxic Beast
monster.toxicBeast.story:
This gowiath's body has been cawved by this wowwd, covewed in numewous scaws. The squeawing queen had seen many battwes. Hew coawse haiw gwowing in jagged patches between each owd wound onwy incweased hew feawsome appeawance. 

Hot bweath fwom the boaw's massive nose fogged up my hewmet so badwy that it was a mawvew I was abwe to evade hew stomping hooves ovewhead.
monster.cremator.name: Cwematow
monster.cremator.story:
I couwd not bewieve my eyes as this cweatuwe ewupted fwom the wava. My suit's tempewatuwe gauges scweeched in wawning. How can anything subsist in such heat? The wava pawts in waves as the monstew swims wapidwy thwough it. 

Thwough cwatews in the Cwematow's thick back awmow wed hot bouwdews expwode in evewy diwection. The amount of heat and pwessuwe within its body must be a souwce of immense powew. Howevew, its head does not appeaw as weww pwotected. I pway that it is a souwce of weakness, fow if this weviathan bests me I know thewe wiww be no wemains weft to mawk my showt existence.
monster.scavenger.name: Scavengew
monster.scavenger.story:
Who knew a pack wat couwd be so dangewous! This cweatuwe seems to be hoawding many of the items wittewed acwoss this pwanet. I have seen no othews of its kind. If it hadn't been so intent on swaying me I wouwd have twied to gain this Scavengew as an awwy.. 

Wiww I evew see a fwiendwy face again, ow wiww my wast bweaths be on this hostiwe pwanet?
monster.providence.name: Pwovidence
monster.providence.story:
I wecognized him fwom the secuwity footage... he was the one who bwew the cawgo hatches open. He was the one who kiwwed evewyone. 

Pwovidence, as I came to caww him, moved fastew and with mowe puwpose than anything ewse I've seen on this pwanet. He must command gweat powew, fow he seemed to easiwy contwow two gweat giwded wuwms of a species simiwaw to the Magma Wowm. Is he abwe to command evewyone on this pwanet? I don't know his puwpose, ow his weasoning, but he did not give me a choice. I had to kiww him... so why do I feew wike I made a tewwibwe mistake?

...Why did we have a tewepowtew fwom this pwanet in ouw cawgo howd?
monster.bramble.name: Bwambwe
monster.bramble.story: Whiwe wawking thwough ovewgwown wuins I found mysewf suwwounded by stwange wustwing that I couwd not pwace.  Stepping into a massive tempwe, vines whipped the entwyway shut and the ivy began swithewing down the wawws.  These wiving Bwambwes spit caustic venom and I'm thankfuw to onwy have howes weft in my gwoves. Theiw hypnotic sway distiwws feaw in me and I wecognize some highew intewwigence in theiw movements.  The bawk at theiw base faciwitates some kind of wocomotion, though I can't identify any appawent muscuwaw system inside that wouwd dwive it. Aftew the encountew, the wesuwting coughs and spasms weft me on edge as I scawed the towew and weft the echoes behind me.
monster.lemurianCavalry.name: Wemuwian Cavawwy
monster.lemurianCavalry.story: I found a gwoup of wed Wemuwians westing in the diwapidated wuins with domesticated boaws awongside them.  I've nevew seen a wed species outside of the fwying types, though I doubt these awe any mowe wewcoming.  With gweat speaws and fwamboyant hewmets, they wesembwe cavawwy of times past, and I'm not equipped to face any chawiots head-on. In the distance I can see two of them spawwing atop theiw beasts. They attack with shawp agiwity and acwobatic pwowess that I hope to nevew expewience.
monster.macrobe.name: Macwobe
monster.macrobe.story: Sinking into an endwess wake, I was caught off-guawd by these huge cewwuwaw beasts.  Bounding towawds me, I can awmost identify theiw intewnaw anatomy behind thick membwanes - How is it possibwe that some sowt of micwobe couwd get this wawge?  Can this weawwy be a singwe ceww? Wough, thown-wike ciwia coat its suwface and it's fwagewwum sewves as a wazow shawp whip. The watew doesn't seem to impede it at aww, though its stwange bouncing behaviow may be a wesuwt of its attempts to puwsue me undew heavy watew pwessuwe. I'm weawy of the fowce it seems to exewt even within these conditions. My oxygen suppwy can't affowd any weaks.
monster.macrobicPredator.name: Macwobic Pwedatow
monster.macrobicPredator.story: Some kind of massive insect, this cweatuwe snaps wike a vipew and skittews wike an ant.  It shouwdn't be possibwe at such a scawe to move so abwuptwy and yet it does.  Simiwaw to the Macwobe, this monstew is some kind of pwedatowy ceww. With a massive wope of newves at its cowe, I can onwy imagine it acts on instinct awone.  I dug into a cowpse to see if the spinaw wope couwd sustain me in this toxic hive, but I found my awms stuck to the thick membwane and I had to use my knife to wemove the non-newtonian gew. It'd make a gweat twap fow pwey, but I don't have time to test that theowy.
monster.lynxTribe.name: Wynx Twibe
monster.lynxTribe.story: I gwanced to one side, twying to get my beawings. By sheew wuck, my eyes picked up something bawewy visibwe, so stiww it couwd be mistaken fow a wock. A shivew wan down my spine as I weawized it was awive. I hadn't heawd anything appwoach; how wong had it been watching me? Why hadn't it attacked me? I suppose the cweatuwe had nevew seen anything wike me. As we exchanged gazes, I noticed thewe wewe mowe of them. Gwipped by feaw, I shot a gwance at my fiweawm which, in my hubwis, was stiww in its howstew. A twig snapped, and I immediatewy wooked back to them, but they wewe gone. I wawk swowwy now. Thewe couwd be one of these behind evewy bwade of gwass.
monster.lynxTotem.name: Wynx Totem
monster.lynxTotem.story: Twavewwing thwough the fungaw cavewns, I kept seeing out of pwace wubbwe that twaiwed to nowhewe.  With no buiwdings in sight, I was shocked to see a bwick waww in the distance.  Wittwe cat-wike cweatuwes with masks and weaponwy danced awound the stwuctuwe, and I couwd heaw them waugh with one anothew.  They appeawed to be pwacticing some kind of wowship, though the stwuctuwe wooked unwike anything I've seen on this pwanet.  Mowe of them cwawwed out fwom the diwt neawby, but stwangewy I haven't seen any evidence of them westing ow hiding in the soiw pwiow to that.  Wuckiwy they wewe distwacted - I don't know that I couwd take on a howde of that size, no mattew how smaww they wewe.
monster.swift.name: Swift
monster.swift.story: These fwying stones manage to stay aiwbowne despite theiw shawe awmow.  Wike a thousand dawts thwown fwom the sun, they dive so swiftwy towawd me that theiw beaks swam into the gwound.  I've yet to see a suwface that they cannot punctuwe, and I'm shocked that theiw beaks nevew seem wown. Theiw pwedictive aim is twoubwing, and they seem to know whewe I'm headed befowe I do. I've witnessed packs of these stwange biwds ciwcwing wike vuwtuwes in the distant sky, though I've nevew witnessed any of them scavenging fow food. Attempts to fashion theiw awmow into new bwades have wesuwted in nothing but chips in my knife.
monster.trokk.name: Twokk
monster.trokk.story: Whiwe westing in the shade of a massive twee, I was stawtwed at what I thought was an eawthquake.  The gwound shifted beneath my feet and I was suddenwy thwown into the aiw.  Beneath me was the gaping maw of a Twokk, and if I wewen't awweady gwipping my pistow it wouwd've cwushed me into sheet metaw.  Beyond the stone extewiow of this stwange wawking wog is some kind of vuwnewabwe fwesh wike the inside of an awwigatow's mouth.  With no space fow a stomach I shuddew at the thought of what happens to its victims.
monster.tuber.name: Tubew
monster.tuber.story: The Tubew is weminiscent of the smaww pwants I cawed fow back on the ship.  Nestwing themsewves deep in the gwound, they hide fwom pwey and wait fow vibwations to initiate theiw fanged attack.  Wike fighting a giant antwion, sometimes the best stwategy was to wuwe them out by tossing spent magazines. I twied stones and othew bait, but theiw wesponses to the bait seemed dependant on some unseen quawity.  The behaviow of the beasts on the pwanet continue to concewn me - I feew wike aww eyes awe on me despite how natuwaw these animaws seem fwom a distance.

stage.desolateForest.name: Desowate Fowest
stage.desolateForest.story: Cwashing into a vewdant fiewd isn't the wowst outcome. I can see wush, wowwing hiwws and stwange castwes buiwt into mountains. Thewe awe foweign species patwowwing the gwasswands and bizawwe housing foundations ewected awong wown footpaths. I've seen wizawds who wawk wike men and othewwowwdwy stone cweatuwes infused by bwazing wights.  They seem dociwe and intewwigent, passing by one anothew with wittwe intewaction, but theiw stiffened postuwes weave me wawy. Thewe's so much cuwtuwe hewe fow an undocumented pwanet. Thewe's so much histowy to these buiwdings, but theiw constwuction doesn't make any sense. Webaw and concwete make up juveniwe fabwications, accompanied by wown bwicks gathewed fwom ancient castwes just metews away.  Twee stumps and dead bwanches wittew the wandscape as if a fowest was fewwed. But decay settwed on this gawden wong ago... How do you get to concwete befowe waising a singwe viwwage? Wed spawks dance in the distant sky.  I don't know what I'm hoping fow.
stage.driedLake.name: Dwied Wake
stage.driedLake.story: A massive desewt fiwwed with boawdwawks and ten-foot cwabs. I'm shocked that this is anywhewe neaw the fowest I was just in, but I can stiww see those mountains in the distance - Aww that gweenewy twaded fow dust and skewetons. I wouwd think these catwawks wewe buiwt to pwotect fwom the hot sand bewow, but these wwecked ships awe buwied in such shawwow dunes. When was thewe watew hewe?
